## Abstract
A short description of the issue being addressed.

## Motivation
The motivation is critical for SEGs as they change overall industry guidelines.
It should clearly explain why the existing guidelines are inadequate to address the problem
that this SEG solves as well as how the SEG is in line with community goals.

## Impact
A list of the sections that will be impacted, and a summary of their anticipated changes.
